A better model for data publishing. Find out more.

Easy

It's easy and quick to set up your first data store and get the most from publishing your data.

Secure

Your data store lives in a secure, backed up and ISO27001 compliant UK data centre.

Flexible

Start, increase, downsize or stop your plan any time - without penalty.

Pricing

Affordable. And did we mention that we're a social enterprise?

Free Tier

  • Up to 4 datasets.
  • Shared instance.
  • 1 Organisation.
  • 0 Groups.
  • Free!
  • Sign Up

Basic

  • Up to 19 datasets.
  • Shared instance.
  • 1 Organisation.
  • 1 Group.
  • £25 per month.
  • Sign Up

Mid

  • Up to 49 datasets.
  • Custom subdomain.
  • 5 Organisations.
  • 10 Groups.
  • £120 per month
  • Sign Up

Heavy

  • Up to 99 datasets.
  • Domain mapping.
  • 20 Organisations.
  • 50 Groups.
  • £200 per month.
  • Sign Up

Launching the Data Place

Almost a year ago we created our first data store for Plymouth City Council’s Data Play events. Twelve months later we’re delighted to be launching our initial data store platform for everyone to use.
